name: Tales of destiny 2
description:
Tales of Destiny 2 is the latest entry in the series following Tales of Phantasia, Tales of Destiny, and Tales of Eternia. While inheriting the world view of the previous game Tales of Destiny, the characters and scenarios that appear are completely original.

It has been 18 years since Miktran's ambitions were blocked by the activities of the heroes Stahn of the previous work. In the city of Cresta, the kingdom of Seinegald, Kyle, the son of Rutee, one of the heroes who once saved the country, lived. Kyle didn't know his father's face. His mother, Rutee, didn't say much about it. But Kyle believed that his father was Stahn. And he dreamed that he would one day become a hero like him...
